comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content:
This is not Jasta 11! This is a group of airmen who are assembled for the Kaiser's visit in August 1917 to the area. Richthofen was wounded at this time, but stands in the foreground/ his head in bandages beneath his cap. The three men behind them all wear the Pour le Merite as well as Richthofen. They are from left:

Paul Freiherr von Pechmann (an observer who earned it who served in a Flieger-Abteilung/two-seater unit)
I can't recognize this fellow.
Rudolf Berthold (Leader of Jasta 18 and later Jagdgeschwader II, 44 victories)

The rest are
